column2: Insists you would enjoy a Phish concert if you got a little high first.
column3: Makes a whistling sound every time they breathe out of their nose.
column5: "Attends furry conventions as their costumed character Stanley the Fox."
column6: Sometimes gets two little pools of spittle in the corners of their mouth.
column7: "Uses the phrase ""you do you"" often and in contexts where it doesn't make sense."
column8: When meeting your friends for the first time always asks if they "like to party"
column9: Texts you coffee memes from Facebook with the message "it me"
column10: Has completely and totally co-opted drag lingo without realising it
column11: Always tucks their napkin in their shirt like a bib while eating
column12: Stopped wearing gauges so their ear lobes are just loose hoops of skin
column13: Legally changed their name and won't tell you what it used to be
column14: Casually swears in front of your niece and nephew
column15: Never washes their towel because "you're clean when you get out of the shower"
column17: Does a pouty face when you're not paying them enough attention
column18: Uses the phrase "at the end of the day" so often it's lost all meaning
column19: Owns a three-foot water bong adorned with a Stewie Griffin sticker
column20: Adds incorrect apostrophes to words that end in S
column21: Wears an Adventure Time backpack in public
column23: Rides one of those really tall bikes around town to get attention
column24: Wardrobe is mostly thrift store sweatpants
column28: Has a decal of "the shocker" on the back window of their Honda Civic
column29: Speaks to you in a baby voice when they want something
column30: Has a cockatoo that will live 50 years and hates you
column31: Talks your ear off about how much they made on Bitcoin
column32: Repeats punchlines out line while watching stand-up specials on Netflix
